A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Hollywood can make any movie look good these days. But this was filled with left leaning political ideology (feminism\, animal cruelty\, stupid men) and so much bull crap that it ruined whatever it had going for it. The made up and unexplained force powers (Rey's ability to use the force with ZERO training) and the manufactured tension\, long run time\, and OBVIOUS rehashes from the empire strikes back and return of the Jedi (rebel base discovered\, evacuate\, space battle\, hopeless defense on a white planet with trenches and AT-ATs...) makes it a true deviation from the Star Wars under GL. \nGood luck Disney\, sadly you'll make money no matter what.
